16:27 <@sdumitriu> sburjan: Did you test potgresql migrations?  
16:27 <+sburjan> well I tested them on friday when we talked  
16:28 <+sburjan> did you commit something since then ? (I didn't follow)  
16:29 <+sburjan> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/e8a4d64dab1f2dfbce9fe70e24c0ca9166956f53 didn't fixed the issue  
16:29 <+sburjan> and tomorrow I'm going in holidays
